taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Dichanthelium chamaelonche subsp. breve (Hitchc. & Chase) Freckmann & Lelong

bio:treatment.description: Culms 5-20 cm, glabrous or puberulent. Sheaths puberulent or glabrous; blades strongly involute, often arcuate, puberulent or glabrous on both surfaces. Primary panicles usually barely exserted above the dense basal tuft of blades. Spikelets 1.3-1.5 mm, puberulent. 2n = unknown.
bio:treatment.discussion: Dichanthelium chamaelonche subsp. breve grows only in peninsular Florida.
